main event: Several reliable witnesses observed a 30 to 40 feet diameter glowing object traveling at a high speed in the area on April 3, generating intense light.
interesting points: The reported sighting is part of a series of similar incidents occurring in the general geographic region in recent weeks.
Authorities are investigating the incident, but no further details are available at this time.

The object was described as being 30 to 40 feet in diameter, glowing with intense light, and traveling at a high rate of speed.
